abstract: Wells Fargo and its former director of research were fined for failing to disclose in a research report that an analyst had taken a job with the company she was recommending.
snippet: Wells Fargo and its former director of research were fined for failing to disclose in a research report that an analyst had taken a job with the company she was recommending.
lead_paragraph: The NASD said yesterday that it had fined Wells Fargo and its former director of research for failing to disclose in a research report that an analyst had taken a job with the company she was recommending.

headline.main: Wells Fargo and Ex-Analyst Are Fined
headline.print_headline: Wells Fargo and Ex-Analyst Are Fined

abstract: John G. Stumpf, Wells Fargo’s chief operating officer, has become chief executive a year and a half earlier than expected.
snippet: John G. Stumpf, Wells Fargo’s chief operating officer, has become chief executive a year and a half earlier than expected.
lead_paragraph: The Wells Fargo stagecoach has a new driver.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Gives Next Chief an Early Start
headline.print_headline: Wells Fargo Gives Next Chief an Early Start

abstract: The NASD said Wednesday that it had fined Wells Fargo and its former director of research for failing to disclose that an analyst had taken a job with the company she was recommending.
snippet: The NASD said Wednesday that it had fined Wells Fargo and its former director of research for failing to disclose that an analyst had taken a job with the company she was recommending.
lead_paragraph: The NASD said today that it had fined Wells Fargo and its former director of research for failing to disclose in a research report that an analyst had taken a job with the company she was recommending.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Fined in Disclosure Case

abstract: The NASD said Wednesday that it had fined Wells Fargo and its former director of research for failing to disclose in a research report that an analyst had taken a job with the company she was recommending. The analyst, Jennifer Jordan, who is now a corporate vice president in charge of investor relations at the company, Cadence Design Systems, refused to settle the NASD case and will fight it, her lawyer said.
lead_paragraph: The NASD said Wednesday that it had fined Wells Fargo and its former director of research for failing to disclose in a research report that an analyst had taken a job with the company she was recommending. The analyst, Jennifer Jordan, who is now a corporate vice president in charge of investor relations at the company, Cadence Design Systems, refused to settle the NASD case and will fight it, her lawyer said.

headline.main: Wells Fargo and Ex-Analyst Are Fined
